DOC.brief_title: The Use Acupuncture Treatment Chemotherapy-induced Peripheral Neuropathy ( CIPN ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The trial clinical , single-center , randomized trial study involve 30 adult cancer patient chemotherapy-induced peripheral neuropathy randomize two group ( control acupuncture treat 10 session , 2X per week ) . Both CIPN patient group submit complete physical examination clinical assessment National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events Scale Version 2.0 , Functional Independence Measure Scale , European Organisation Research Treatment Cancer Quality Life Questionnaire Core 30 Scale Visual Analogue Scale pain treatment 5 week follow-up treatment .
